H.text: L. Dennis Kozlowski finished four days of testimony at his grand larceny trial.

H.text: The first Tyco trial ended with a mistrial.

H.text: Tyco International Ltd.'s former head of finance testified on 24 February, 2005.
H.ref: Tyco International Ltd.'s former head of finance testified Thursday he never saw that millions of dollars in special bonuses for former top executives L. Dennis Kozlowski and Mark H. Swartz were ever approved by the company's compensation committee.

H.text: A retired chairman of the board of Tyco International Ltd. testified the company's financial monitors never told him about millions of dollars for Tyco's two top executives.
H.ref: A retired chairman of the board of Tyco International Ltd. testified the company's financial monitors never told him about millions of dollars in forgiven loans and bonuses for Tyco's two top executives.

H.text: A $2 million birthday party is a key component in the prosecution's case in the first trial of Tyco International Ltd.
H.ref: A $2 million (euro1.5 million) birthday party, a key component in the prosecution's case in the first trial of Tyco International Ltd.'s former top executives, was raised for the first time Tuesday in their retrial.

H.text: On 2 May, 2005, a prosecutor questioned L. Dennis Kozlowski about millions spent for his Manhattan apartment.
